response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. Given its value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special price tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen.

I propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects a thoughtful balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and the value it holds for you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. By accepting this offer, you not only secure a high-quality asset but also enjoy a favorable deal compared to the market rate.

Please let me know if you require any additional information about the product or if there's anything else I can assist you with in making your decision. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns and align well with your objectives.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
